column4: Where does the ubuntu install of apache2 keep its config files?
/etc/apache2/apache2.conf   looks promising, but its missing things like DocumentRoot
site specific things are in your virtualhost file.  /etc/apache2/sites-available/*  What are you looking for?

module specific configurations are in their respective .conf files in mods-available, virtual host specific things are in sites-available.  You use a2(en|dis)(site|mod) to enable/disable sites and modules
